name: rocapi-examples
description: Examples for mounting an Ro-Crate API

scripts.dev:fastify: pnpm run dev:clean && pnpm run build:ts && concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "TypeScript,App" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold" "pnpm:watch:ts" "pnpm:dev:start:fastify"
scripts.dev:express: pnpm run dev:clean && pnpm run build:ts && concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "TypeScript,App" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold" "pnpm:watch:ts" "pnpm:dev:start:express"
